entry.title: RT stani.lens (🌿,👻): Lenstube is here 🥳🌿🌿 All content stored on @ArweaveTeam and exciting features by @LensProtocol such as pay to subs...
entry.summary: RT stani.lens (🌿,👻) Lenstube is here 🥳🌿🌿 All content stored on @ArweaveTeam and exciting features by @LensProtocol such as pay to subscribe, collect videos and mirror your favourite content to your audience, powered also by @Livepeer 🤩 Goat 🐐effort from the devs on Lensverse 🌿 Lenstube (🎥 ,🌿): gm frens 📢 Lenstube, an open-source web3 video-sharing 🎥 social media platform built on top of @LensProtocol 🌿 is now live on @0xPolygon mainnet 🎉 Try now Zero gas fees ⛽️ thanks to lens relayers. https://lenstube.xyz
